turkish_example_sentence: O çiftliğe gitmişse, taze sebzeleri satın alabilirdi.
english_example_sentence: If he had gone to the farm, he could have bought fresh vegetables.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы он пошел на ферму, он смог бы купить свежие овощи.
